PerfectNetExp.abs: 三后腰(Lumbar)，内心没有分别心，就是真正的苦行。谁该上，学会推销自己,包括思想和行为. 谁该退，三个后腰就连续没弄懂得， …

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from medieval Latin lumbaris, from Latin lumbus 'loin'

entry.def: Lumbar means relating to the lower part of your back.

example.ex: Lumbar support is very important if you're driving a long way.
example.tran: 长途驾驶时，腰部的支撑十分重要。

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or near the part of the back between the ribs and the hipbones;

auth_sentence.content: Wheeler repeated the procedure between the fifth lumbar and the first sacral vertebrae.

auth_sentence.content: Last year, approximately a hundred and fifty thousand lower-lumbar spinal fusions were performed in the United States.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Last year, approximately a hundred and fifty thousand lower-lumbar spinal fusions were performed in the United States.

auth_sentence.content: There are several types of lumbar fusions; Wheeler was performing what is termed a PLIF, a posterior lumbar interbody fusion.
